scripts.bundle-android-old: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --platform ios
scripts.watchman-clear: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.reinstall-apk: npm run uninstall-apk && npm run install-apk
scripts.build-ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace kiwiTraffic.xcworkspace -scheme kiwiTraffic  -configuration Release SYMROOT=/Builds/ios/kiwiTraffic
